title: Effective Multimedia Learning Design: Focused on Language Education Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and foundational knowledge of language acquisition
context.additional_context: A process of applying multimedia design principles for language learning in an offline classroom environment equipped with digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can design lecture materials that effectively combine various multimedia elements (audio, text, images)
Learners analyze the gap between actual comprehension and subjective perception of learning content to select optimal multimedia combinations
Learners produce multimedia learning modules applicable to language education through project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
